::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
flights$distance_category <- cut(flights$distance, 
                                 breaks = seq(0, 5000, by = 1000), 
                                 right = FALSE, 
                                 labels = c("0-1000", "1000-2000", "2000-3000", "3000-4000", "4000-5000"))

ggplot(data = flights, aes(x = distance_category)) +
  geom_bar() +  
  ggtitle("Flights Categorized by Distance Intervals") +
  xlab("Distance (in miles)") +
  ylab("Number of Flights") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Visualizing-Large-Distributions_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
flights$time_category <- cut(flights$air_time, 
                             breaks = seq(0, 700, by = 100),  
                             right = FALSE, 
                             labels = c("0-100", "100-200", "200-300", "300-400", "400-500", 
                                        "500-600", "600-700"))

ggplot(data = flights, aes(x = time_category)) +
  geom_bar() +  
  ggtitle("Flights Categorized by Air Time Intervals") +
  xlab("Air Time (in minutes)") +
  ylab("Number of Flights") +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))  
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Visualizing-Large-Distributions_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data = flights, 
       mapping = aes(x = distance, 
                     y = air_time)) +
  geom_point() +  
  ggtitle("Correlation Between Flight Distance and Air Time") +
  xlab("Distance (in miles)") +
  ylab("Air time (in minutes)") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Removed 9430 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](Visualizing-Large-Distributions_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


For my graphics, I aim to explore the correlation between the distances among different airports and the duration of flights. In the initial graph, I categorize the flight distance into five groups: '0-1000,' '1000-2000,' '2000-3000,' '3000-4000,' '4000-5000,'miles The second graph focuses on illustrating the time between different airports in minutes

The third graph depicts the association between the distance traveled and the corresponding flight duration. It becomes evident that as the distance increases, the duration of flights also tends to extend. While this concept is generally understood, the graph serves as direct evidence supporting this relationship.
